contextId.information: The word "again" indicates that a similar question applies to the second quote. The word "again" can be be simply deleted or replaced with the question. AT: "and" or "and about which of the angels did God ever say" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
To whom God is speaking can be stated clearly. AT: "he also says to Christ" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
You can state clearly the understood information. AT: "also pursue the holiness" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_ellipsis]])
